argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isumclim.1 | |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) |
| 2 |  | isumclim.2 | |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) |
| 3 |  | isumclim.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) = A ) |
| 4 |  | isumclim.4 | |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 5 |  | isumclim2.5 | |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> ) |
| 6 |  | #P_climdm | |- ( seq M ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> <-> seq M ( + , F ) ~~> ( ~~> ` seq M ( + , F ) ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) ~~> ( ~~> ` seq M ( + , F ) ) ) |
| 8 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_isum | |- ( ph -> sum_ k e. Z A = ( ~~> ` seq M ( + , F ) ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_breqtrrd | |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) ~~> sum_ k e. Z A ) |
